data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Agusan del Norte, Philippines a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Agusan del Norte, Philippines

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 112,678 believers in Agusan del Norte against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary: On average, 166 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Agusan del Norte, Philippines.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 112,678 believers living in the state of Agusan del Norte. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, help the 112,678 believers in Agusan del Norte to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Manobo, Umayamnon people.
God, guide the 112,678 believers in Agusan del Norte to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 808,900 souls in Agusan del Norte and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the state of Agusan del Norte, Philippines has a population of 808,900.

We estimate Agusan del Norte has 112,678 people who might know Jesus, 623,140 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 73,082 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Agusan del Norte to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
